name: What's your answer (Updated Version)
description:
In this game you take role as the legend of kuchisake onna. Uncover her past of what happened to her and why she's becoming an iconic legend in japan.

Made by fivehats dev

Designer: Muhammad Ilman Nadhir

Programmer: 

  1. Rigel Vibi Ramadhan
  2. Gilbert Samuel Nicholas Silaban
  3. Raehan Rahmad Fadilah

Artist: Muhammad Fajar Alfath
